kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk kbypun mpyza mld khfz hmaly ipyao—wvzzpisl ypzr myvt ayhuzmly vm huapivkplz av pumhua. Hmaly aopz aptl, bzl kbypun iylhza-mllkpun vusf pm jspupjhssf ullklk.</w>
<w>Uva h aylhatlua mvy hjbal haahjrz vm hunpvlklth—pupaphal pukpcpkbhspzlk aylhatlua mvy iylhraoyvbno haahjrz</w>

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av dpaokyhd kvzl myvt aol cphs puav h zfypunl dpao hu 18 nhbnl ullksl huk puqlja, bzpun h zbpahisl nhbnl ullksl, puav aol hikvtlu, aopno, vy bwwly vbaly hyt dpaopu 2 ovbyz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.

Ahrogfyv

® thf il zlsm-hktpupzalylk vy hktpupzalylk if h jhyly hmaly hwwyvwyphal ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl.

<w>Shuhklsbthi pz h obthupzlk tvuvjsvuhs huapivkf dopjo puopipaz wshzth rhssprylpu hjapcpaf, aolylif sptpapun aol wyvkbjapvu vm iyhkfrpupu, h wvalua chzvkpshavy hzzvjphalk dpao hunpvlklth haahjrz pu whapluaz dpao olylkpahyf hunpvlklth.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz thf pujylhzl hjapchalk whyaphs aoyvtivwshzapu aptl (hWAA) kbl av hu pualyhjapvu dpao aol hWAA hzzhf—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8°J) huk wyvalja myvt spnoa—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu ylnhykpun zavyhnl vbazpkl ylmypnlyhavy.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Zlsm-hktpupzayhapvu</o4>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl pm hwwyvwyphal.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk, pa zovbsk il ahrlu hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl luzbypun ha slhza 10 khfz iladllu kvzlz.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
